summary: The diff implements a TR/EN i18n layer with Turkish default + localStorage persistence, adds a header language switcher, and updates major UI components to use translation keys including weather-condition descriptions via weather codes. Some additional, non-requested styling/utility changes were also introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling and Tailwind theme/token changes unrelated to bilingual i18n requirements (e.g., OKLCH tokens, contrast/readability adjustments).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on i18n, language toggle, persistence, and translation coverage; it does not request global redesign or color/token system changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a weather-contrast helper utility not mentioned in the i18n-focused requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10..REQ-13 do not request new contrast utilities; this appears to be extra functionality beyond translation/toggling/persistence.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/maintained an empty hook file described as unused backend actor integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to add new placeholder/empty hooks; this is unrelated to i18n and could be considered extraneous.
